title: How to Redeem S&H Green Stamps

steps.title: Visit the S&H greenpoints website to see the merchandise the company offers.
steps.content: Visit the S&H greenpoints website to see the merchandise the company offers. In addition to a wide selection of housewares, toys and other merchandise, you can also exchange greenpoints for gift cards redeemable at major retailers.

steps.title: Decide if you want to redeem your stamps for greenpoints or cash.
steps.content: Decide if you want to redeem your stamps for greenpoints or cash. The rate of exchange for Green Stamps to greenpoints is 1 to 1. If you prefer cash, S&H will give you $1.20 for every 1200 Green Stamps that you redeem.

steps.title: Register at the greenpoints website.
steps.content: Register at the greenpoints website. No matter how you want to redeem your stamps, registering with the website is required.

steps.title: Affix your stamps to official S&H Stamp Books if you have them.
steps.content: Affix your stamps to official S&H Stamp Books if you have them. If you do not have any of collector's books, you may affix the stamps to an 8-1/2 X 11 piece of paper. The company will not accept stamps that are mailed in loose.

steps.title: Put your books or sheets of stamps into a large envelope or a shipping box and include a note that contains the following information:
steps.content: Put your books or sheets of stamps into a large envelope or a shipping box and include a note that contains the following information: Your name, address, email address and phone number. Your S&H Member Number, which you received when you registered at the site. The total number of stamps you are enclosing. Whether you want to redeem your stamps for cash or greenpoints.

steps.title: Mail your envelope via certified mail to the following address:
steps.content: Mail your envelope via certified mail to the following address: S&H Solutions; ATTN: Green Stamps Processing Department; South Congress Avenue, Suite 200; Delray Beach, FL 33445.

steps.title: Wait a few weeks for processing, then watch for a check in the mail or log into your greenpoints account to see your new points added.
steps.content: Wait a few weeks for processing, then watch for a check in the mail or log into your greenpoints account to see your new points added.
